pageContext.claim: “Within our first 11 months, we canceled or delayed over 1,500 planned regulatory actions”
pageContext.analysis: This is carefully worded -- ''regulatory actions" -- because many of the items being delayed or withdrawn were not regulations yet. "Hundreds of the pending regulations had been effectively shelved before Trump took office," Bloomberg News reported. "Others listed as withdrawn are actually still being developed by federal agencies. Still more were moot because the actions sought in a pending rule were already in effect."
